/-- If f : X → Y is a Serre fibration, then the obvious maps π_n(F,x0) → π_n(X,x0) → π_n(Y,y0) fit into a long exact sequence ⋯ → π_n(F,x0) → π_n(X,x0) → π_n(Y,y0) → π_{n-1}(F,x0) → ⋯. -/
theorem π_desc (F : Type u_1) [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y] {f : X → Y}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- If f : X → Y is a Serre fibration, then the homotopy groups of the fibre, total space and base fit into a long exact sequence
    ... → π_n(F,x0) → π_n(X,x0) → π_n(Y,y0) → π_{n-1}(F,x0) → ... . -/
theorem serre_fibration_long_exact_sequence {X Y : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y]
  (f : X → Y) (hf : IsSerreFibration f) {y0 : Y} (F := {x : X // f x = y0}) (x0 : F) :
  LongExactSequence (fun n => π n (F : Type*) (x0 : X)) (fun n => π n X (x0 : X)) (fun n => π n Y y0) := by sorry

args.natural_language_statement: Translate into Lean4: If f : X → Y is a Serre fibration, then the obvious maps π_n(F,x0) → π_n(X,x0) → π_n(Y,y0) fit together into a long exact sequence ... → π_n(F,x0) → π_n(X,x0) → π_n(Y,y0) → π_{n-1}(F,x0) → ... . Here F is the fibre f^{-1}(y0) and x0 : F is a chosen basepoint over y0. End the statement with := by sorry. Include import Mathlib at top and name the theorem serre_fibration_long_exact_sequence.

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- If f : X → Y is a Serre fibration, then for any basepoint y0 : Y and any x0 in the fibre F := {x : X // f x = y0}
    the obvious maps on homotopy groups fit into a long exact sequence
    ... → π_n(F,x0) → π_n(X,x0) → π_n(Y,y0) → π_{n-1}(F,x0) → ... -/
theorem serre_fibration_long_exact_sequence {X Y : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y]
  (f : X → Y) (hf : IsSerreFibration f) (y0 : Y) (x0 : {x : X // f x = y0}) :
  LongExactSequence
    (fun n => π n ({x : X // f x = y0}) (x0 : {x : X // f x = y0}))
    (fun n => π n X (x0 : X))
    (fun n => π n Y y0) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- If f : X → Y is a Serre fibration, then for any basepoint y0 : Y and any x0 in the fibre F := {x : X // f x = y0}
    the obvious maps on homotopy groups fit into a long exact sequence
    ... → π_n(F,x0) → π_n(X,x0) → π_n(Y,y0) → π_{n-1}(F,x0) → ... . -/
theorem serre_fibration_long_exact_sequence {X Y : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y]
  (f : X → Y) (hf : IsSerreFibration f) (y0 : Y) (x0 : {x : X // f x = y0}) :
  LongExactSequence
    (fun n => π n ({x : X // f x = y0}) x0)
    (fun n => π n X (x0 : X))
    (fun n => π n Y y0) := by sorry

    (fun n => π n ({x : X // f x = y0}) x0)
    (fun n => π n X x0.val)
    (fun n => π n Y y0) := by sorry
